ShortDescription.Value: A simple way to decorate and detail your DIY airport!

Publish.LongDescription:
# This is my first mod and I'm still learning more, so:
- It contains BASIC markings currently - I'll update more contants through the future updates
# An eazy way to detail your airport!
Add some new decals and neetlines to the game, making it much easier to decorate your airport ground.
## With this mod, you can:
- Add extra dedails to your airport ground - Make your airport looks super real and sick
## Note: - This mod is designed for detailing the ground, so it contains only decals and netlanes - Considering the different sizes of players' airports and the different customisation needs of different players, the components added by this mod are not "standard parts" - more basic markings and textures to give different players more room for DIY!
## Future plan: - Add all decals and netlines and even surfaces that you'll need to create a FAA-legal airport!
